bwwExcerpt: On the heels of President Barack Obama breaking into "Amazing Grace" during a eulogy, a well-meant but embarrassingly uninteresting musical depicting the life saga of the hymn' writer has opened. Watching it, you keep thinking, "How in the world did this get to Broadway?"...Resembling an old-fashion...
